text: Scott Carson (born 3 September 1985) is an English football player. He plays for Manchester City. Carson was born in Whitehaven and raised in Cleator Moor, Cumbria. In 2015, Carson signed for Derby County. As of 2017, he has made 50 appearances for the club and made 19 clean sheets. Carson was named the Jack Stamps Trophy Winner for the year 2016-17. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup
